import sys

for cases in xrange(int(sys.stdin.readline())):
	n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
	l = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
	l.sort()
	c = 0
	t = 0
	bullets = 6
	f = 0
	for i in l:
		if t < i:
			c += 1
			bullets -= 1
			if bullets == 0:	
				bullets = 6
				t += 1
			t += 1
		else:
			print "Killed",c
			f = 1
			break
	if f == 0:	print "Bhai Ho!"
